title: Bolt.new vs Make: Which is Better for Vibe Coding in 2026?
metaDescription: Compare Bolt.new vs Make. Detailed comparison of features, pricing, pros & cons for vibe coding platforms.
introduction: Comparing Bolt.new and Make? Both are powerful vibe coding platforms, each with unique strengths and use cases. This detailed comparison helps you understand the key differences to make the best choice for your project.

sections.title: Overview: Bolt.new vs Make
paragraphs: **Bolt.new**: AI-powered web development agent by StackBlitz that enables building full-stack applications from natural language prompts. Powered by WebContainers for in-browser development with production-grade capabilities.. It excels at ai-builder and no-code with a focus on developer productivity.

**Make**: Visual no-code automation platform connecting 3,000+ applications without coding. Features drag-and-drop scenario builder, conditional logic, and AI workflow support.. Users appreciate it for automation and no-code.

sections.title: Pricing & Plans
paragraphs: Choose based on your budget and feature requirements.

sections.title: Key Features Comparison
paragraphs: **Bolt.new Features**: AI prompt-to-application generation, In-browser full-stack development environment, WebContainer runtime for instant preview
**Make Features**: Drag-and-drop visual scenario builder, 3,000+ pre-built app integrations, Conditional logic and branching
Consider which features matter most for your specific use case.

sections.title: Learning Curve & Ease of Use
paragraphs: Bolt.new is moderately easy to learn, with good documentation and community support.
Make has a straightforward learning curve, making it accessible to beginners.
Both platforms emphasize developer experience and productivity.

sections.title: Community & Support
paragraphs: Bolt.new has an active community with regular updates and good support resources.
Make maintains strong community engagement and responsive customer support.
Both offer documentation, tutorials, and active developer communities.

verdict: Both Bolt.new and Make are excellent vibe coding platforms. Choose Bolt.new if you prioritize ai-builder, and select Make if you need automation.
